Tag_Youmay.description: Kassandra's genetic memory | Ezio Auditore's [[Birds of a Feather | genetic memory]]

MemoryInfobox.name: Birds of a Feather
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The sultry and headstrong Piracy|pirate queen of the Aegean Sea|Aegean, Xenia, tasked Kassandra with finding a lost treasure—the Golden Feather of Ajax|Golden Feather of Ajax.'

General_Description: '''Birds of a Feather''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: The [[Keos]] pirate [[Xenia]] tasked Kassandra with finding the lost [[Golden Feather of Ajax]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to Xenia at the [[Temple of Athena Nedousia]] in Keos.
*'''Xenia:''' ''Ah, the mighty [[Mercenary|misthios]]. You proved yourself capable before... I could use your talents. One like you is always interested in more [[drachma]]e, yes?''
<tabber>
|-|I'm always interested in getting paid.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Always happy to hear the clink of drachmae. Tell me what you want.''
|-|Payment is fine, but I'm happy to help you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Payment is well and good. But I'm happy to help you. Tell me what you're thinking.''
</tabber>
*'''Xenia:''' ''I have an appetite for rare treasures. I've heard many veiled rumors and provocative stories, and I want you to recover some of these lost wonders for me.''
<tabber>
|-|I'll bring you the treasures.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me where to look, and I'll bring you these treasures.''
|-|I'm too busy.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't have the patience to go chasing after children's stories.''
Kassandra left, but eventually reconsidered her decision and returned to Xenia.
*'''Xenia''' ''What tide sweeps you back to me, Kassandra? Are you up for finding my treasures now?''
(returns to previous option)
</tabber>
*'''Xenia:''' ''Have you heard of the mighty [[Ajax]]?''
*'''Kassandra: '''''One of [[Homer]]'s heroes.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Yes! He had a golden [[eagle]] feather, a gift from [[Jupiter|Zeus]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And why do you care about it?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''It is a rare reminder of a glorious age. And so deserves to be in my grasp. Take these maps and see if you can find it.''
(If "Where is the feather?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where will I find this golden eagle feather?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Different tales place it at different locations. I have maps showing where you might find it.''
(If "What is the story of the feather?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What can you tell me about Ajax's feather?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''The son of [[Telamon]] was said to be a fearless [[giant]]. Some say the golden feather that gave him courage was woven into a [[shield]] crafted of seven [[Cattle|ox]] hides. The shield is long destroyed, but Zeus' feather remains.''
(Leave – "I'll start my search.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll find this feather for you, if it's there to be found.''
Sometime later, Kassandra acquired the feather and returned to an eager Xenia.
*'''Xenia:''' ''You return on the wind. Do you have Ajax's golden feather for me?''
<tabber>
|-|It'll cost you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here. One golden eagle feather, per request.''
*'''Xenia''' ''What a pretty, pretty thing.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Glad you're happy. Now, my pay?''
*'''Xenia''' ''Calm yourself. Here, for your trouble.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thanks.''
|-|I'll give you the feather.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here, have it. It's lovely, no?''
*'''Xenia''' ''Yes, it will fit nicely in my collection.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Xenia recover Ajax's golden feather.
Section_Trivia: * This quest becomes available only after completing [[Ashes to Ashes (Odyssey)|Ashes to Ashes]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
{{ACODMemories}}
[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
[[Category:Memories relived using the Animus HR-8.5]]

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra returned to Xenia at the [[Temple of Athena Nedousia]] in Keos.
*'''Xenia:''' ''Ah, the mighty [[Mercenary|misthios]]. You proved yourself capable before... I could use your talents. One like you is always interested in more [[drachma]]e, yes?''
<tabber>
|-|I'm always interested in getting paid.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Always happy to hear the clink of drachmae. Tell me what you want.''
|-|Payment is fine, but I'm happy to help you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Payment is well and good. But I'm happy to help you. Tell me what you're thinking.''
</tabber>
*'''Xenia:''' ''I have an appetite for rare treasures. I've heard many veiled rumors and provocative stories, and I want you to recover some of these lost wonders for me.''
<tabber>
|-|I'll bring you the treasures.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me where to look, and I'll bring you these treasures.''
|-|I'm too busy.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't have the patience to go chasing after children's stories.''
Kassandra left, but eventually reconsidered her decision and returned to Xenia.
*'''Xenia''' ''What tide sweeps you back to me, Kassandra? Are you up for finding my treasures now?''
(returns to previous option)
</tabber>
*'''Xenia:''' ''Have you heard of the mighty [[Ajax]]?''
*'''Kassandra: '''''One of [[Homer]]'s heroes.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Yes! He had a golden [[eagle]] feather, a gift from [[Jupiter|Zeus]].''

*'''Xenia:''' ''It is a rare reminder of a glorious age. And so deserves to be in my grasp. Take these maps and see if you can find it.''
(If "Where is the feather?" is chosen.)

*'''Xenia:''' ''Different tales place it at different locations. I have maps showing where you might find it.''
(If "What is the story of the feather?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What can you tell me about Ajax's feather?''

*'''Xenia:''' ''The son of [[Telamon]] was said to be a fearless [[giant]]. Some say the golden feather that gave him courage was woven into a [[shield]] crafted of seven [[Cattle|ox]] hides. The shield is long destroyed, but Zeus' feather remains.''
(Leave – "I'll start my search.")

Sometime later, Kassandra acquired the feather and returned to an eager Xenia.
*'''Xenia:''' ''You return on the wind. Do you have Ajax's golden feather for me?''
<tabber>
|-|It'll cost you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here. One golden eagle feather, per request.''
*'''Xenia''' ''What a pretty, pretty thing.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Glad you're happy. Now, my pay?''
*'''Xenia''' ''Calm yourself. Here, for your trouble.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thanks.''
|-|I'll give you the feather.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here, have it. It's lovely, no?''
*'''Xenia''' ''Yes, it will fit nicely in my collection.''
</tabber>
